website_summaries.verdict: A bargain buy that's wildly popular to dry and de-frizz curly or thick hair.
pros: Utilizes both tourmaline ionic technology and infrared heat to smooth hair and add shine
Comes with attachments, including a great diffuser for curly or kinky hair
A tenth the price of similar top-of-the-line dryers but with the same quick drying-time benefits
cons: For some users the unit broke down after only a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Cool hair tool
customer_reviews.text: Posted these two pics. One is with my hair dried on naturally and the other is with the diffuser. I see more volume in my hair and its stays shiny. Takes me like 25 minutes to get my hair done but its worth it. I hate going outside with wet hair when its less than 50°
customer_reviews.author: Idamys Davila

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap hair dyer in a time pinch but didn’t have time to research. Some of my girlfriends were trying to talk me into buying a $200 hair dryer and after talking to them, my expectations were very low. I’m not sure what kind of job a $200 hair dryer is supposed to do but I was pleasantly surprised with how fast this hair dryer dried my very thick hair!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool, but Still Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this dryer 5 🌟 except that the "cool shot" button is only a warm shot button... Which in the curly hair world is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Just Average
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a review that named it the best hair dryer on the market. I already had a T3 and after using the Revlon dryer for a few months I went back to using the T3 because it just works better.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Diva

customer_reviews.title: Good for defusing
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this hair dryer. I mainly use it to just help defuse my curly hair and I really like the defuser attachment and it stays on well. The hair dryer is a bit heavier than my old one but it’s not bad. I kind of like that it lights up too when it’s on.
customer_reviews.author: Deahnna

customer_reviews.title: Like better than I expected to
customer_reviews.text: First hair dryer I’ve bought in years. Glad I bought it. Dries fast, but not hard. (I have short, but curly- kinky hair). I think the ionic/ceramic technology makes a desirable difference.
customer_reviews.author: The Wonderer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt blow hot air
customer_reviews.text: My previous Revlon lasted 10 years!! So when it died I thought it would be a good idea to stick with the Revlon brand. Big mistake. Huge. This drier doesnt get hot. The warm and hot functions are THE EXACT SAME TEMP. Before I could dry my fine and thin hair in 8-10 minutes. This drier takes a solid 20-25 due to the barely warm air it blows out. So disappointed and now I shall be on the hunt for a new brand of hair drier. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AzEva

customer_reviews.title: Great for volume, terrible for curls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Revlon blow dryer that I'd had for years and really liked, but is no longer made. I use this with diffuser to dry my short, wavy/curly hair. While it does indeed dry my hair very quickly and with lots of volume, it takes out all the curl, leaving me with basically straight hair. It's because of the configuration of the openings on the diffuser. I tried using old diffuser on this new blow dryer, but it doesn't fit. Very disappointing and now I need to find another new blow dryer that actually keeps the curl in curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT GET HOT ENOUGH👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst blow dryer I’ve ever bought- such a huge disappointment- the biggest complaint I have is that it doesn’t even get hot. My old blow dryer was starting to crap the bed so I bought this one- and after 10 minutes of using it I had to grab my old one and even that one worked better than a “brand new” one. Now I’ve got to go through the hassle of returning it and going out and buying a new one- total waste of time :(
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a 5 minute test, not easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Bummer! I'm one of those that it happened to! Used for 5 minutes then put away. Tried to use it again and it wouldn't turn back on. 😓 Luckily it had an easy Hassel free return to Kohl's so they packed and shipped it all for me. It wasn't comfortable to hold so I went with a different type and I'm happier with (and on sale at Target)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Early

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Less Frizz
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair that is often frizzy when I use a blow dryer. This dryer dried my hair with little frizz when I used the diffuser. I haven’t dried my hair straight with it but my daughter has. She has straight hair and it dried smoothly and left her hair shiny. She still used her flat iron after but I thought her hair looked perfect before she straightened her hair. Other blow dryers make her hair poofy so she has to flat iron it. The blow dryer is lightweight and quiet and easy to handle and has a cool shot to set the style.
customer_reviews.author: Rose F.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. It drys my hair super fast. I read alot of reviews, this seemed to be the best for the amount of money I wanted to spend. My daughter appropriated my more expensive hair dryer, but I honestly prefer this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. temby

customer_reviews.title: If you need the straightening attachment - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer twice thinking the first one was defective. BOTH dryers had the same issue. The straightening attachment does NOT stay on the dryer and consistently falls off rendering it useless to straighten my hair. On the pro side - the drying time is quick.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ostroff

customer_reviews.title: Almost too hot for the pepper--
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to switch with the blowndryer I received from my cosmetology school (a Diane 1875) but ended up using it for home instead, because it didn't include a comb and, after a few uses, I thought the heat might be too much clients, but after I bought a universal comb attachment, I couldn't imagine going through my siblings thick, kinky-curls with anything but this. Careful though, if you tend to hold the blow dryer by the nozzle, it quickly gets too hot to hold comfortably and you'll either have to switch to a different setting or a different position entirely.
customer_reviews.author: PoshPluto

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The clips are useless but the hair dryer is amazing! I have wavy thick hair and I bought this last year and just using this and a round brush straightens it better than a flat iron. I dropped it last month and something in it broke and it wouldn’t work. I needed something ASAP so I bought an ionic revlon blow dryer but it couldn’t hold a candle to this. So I used that while waiting the few days for this to come in the mail. I’m keeping the revlon one for travel because it’s smaller.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieLynn

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well. Can't complain for the price
customer_reviews.text: been using this for almost a year now i think. Have to say. The gd and I both like it better then her old more expensive model. Hair does feel softer when using this vs her old dryer. Takes less time vs that one as well. As to the infra-red.... maybe it works maybe it does. I can't really see a difference. Worked pretty well to thaw my freezer a few weeks ago as well
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is pretty decent, especially for the price. I have an older Revlon hair dryer and wanted to try a new infra red ceramic dryer for faster hair drying. I think it actually drys faster than my old one! It's light and not too loud, the negatives are that there are only 2 settings, hot/warm, high/low and my biggest complaint is not cold. Although it did state that in the description, I just wish they had that feature. So I will keep this one and hope it lasts as long as the dryer I am replacing as its still works I just wanted a new model!!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how bad it is!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally shocked how bad this product is. I only used it one time, about 4 mins. The second time it couldn't be turned on. The accessories are hard to put them on and hard to take them off. Really a piece of junk! Even if it costs $1, still not worth of it as you have to spend your valuable time to the UPS store to return it.
customer_reviews.author: logan123

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to Write Home About
customer_reviews.text: This dryer has excellent reviews and is touted as a low-priced option that has ionic, infrared, and ceramic technology. Well, it's low-cost, but as for the technology...it does NOTHING. I've been using it for a couple of weeks, and I see no difference in the shine, frizziness, and drying time. I happened to use a quality ionic, ceramic dryer at someone else house the other day, and I can tell you that that dryer WORKED SO WELL. The drying time was drastically reduced, even though I used a lower heat setting and lower air volume setting, and my hair was less frizzy and more smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Burned up-literally- within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I would never recommend buying this hair dryer! It literally had sparks flying out of it within 90 days of purchase. This was a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: RA Rush

customer_reviews.title: Don't even try- returned !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dryer after reading some great reviews. The first time it arrived, I observed the body is made up of breakable plastic. I couldn't detach the diffuser (it was so so tight). I had this constant fear that I am going to break this. I replaced it with the same dryer again and this time it was so loud and with the same problem with the diffuser. Returned. Still hunting a good dryer with a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: ghata

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: It was ok till it broke after only 3 and a half months.
customer_reviews.author: Mihaela

customer_reviews.title: Hair isnt frizzy! Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best hair dryer for this price range. It somehow doesnt make my hair as frizzy as a normal hair dryer does. I have thick straight hair, but typically after I blow dry it, it becomes very puffy and frizzy for a few hours. With this dryer, my hair stayed flat and shiny right after i finished blow drying. It is a little heavy and itd be nice if the air was a bit stronger, but other than that I love this hair dryer. It has 2 heat settings, 2 speed settings, and a cool air button as well. The hot air setting also isnt too not like my old hair dryer was.
customer_reviews.author: bchong

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new Revlon infrared Haur Dryer because like all ladies your previous one went out. I didn’t want to spend a fortune on a dryer since I only use it part time because my hair is curly. I was also looking for one that came with a diffuser. This one came with all attachments and extra clips. Very light weight, easy to use. I like the infrared on it it seems to leave less frizz and less damage. It’s drys my hair quickly and I daresay faster then the previous 3 hair dryers I’ve had. I would recommend this to any wanting a decent dryer without the huge cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and works well. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see in the description that the head of the dryer is glowing red so the clear attachments look pretty cool. Most dryers are designed the same these days. This one has a pretty pearlescent body. The cooling button that is placed to easily press while using the defuser when you need to cool down your scalp. I don't understand how the technology is supposed to work. I would buy it again. Best price and quality if you're in to stylish hair tools.
customer_reviews.author: matthew hovey

customer_reviews.title: Quick blow out—-amazing drying power without the intense damaging heat.
customer_reviews.text: Great and quick drying power without the intense heat on hair. I have very thick, shoulder length straight hair. I was able to do a quick blow out within 5 minutes. For real. Amazing! One big adjustment for me would be to be light on where the power buttons are...toggle type switches on the handle so I flipped power on and off few times. Not something that just takes a little time get use to. Very satisfied. Great price also. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kengyroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several hair dryers in the past. I bought this one recently just to try it out and see if it was any better than the others I have used. My hair is typically hair and dull so I was pleasantly surprised by the results after the first use. I used the warm heat on low and was still able to dry my hair faster than any other hair dryer. Best of all was that it kept my hair shiny and soft which NEVER happens when I use a hair dryer. I'm not sure if it's the infrared technology but I'm truly amazed by the results. It's the best hair dryer so far!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer- love it-but Read...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to strongly emphasize when I start this review that the item arrived all accessories. HOWEVER - I had to knock off one star for one reason only. I am a serious recycler and I'm all for cutting down on waste of packaging. But....the one package and Parks did arrive safely as you can see by the photo it was shipped without a box and that's no problem EXCEPT the seams were not reinforced with extra shipping tape at all. It would have really been wiser to really reinforce the seams to make sure none of the item fell out. The blow-dryer is awesome I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristina226

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mediocre..
customer_reviews.text: While this dryer is affordable and user friendly, it does not radiate anything spectacular for a $20 hair blower. It has a warm/hot option and 2 attachments, which are kind of hard to use. I purchased as it has a volumizing/curly hair attachment, and literally it just tangled my daughter's hair up. It does its primary job and the lights are kind if neat, but I'm convinced absolutely useless.. If you are looking for an affordable replacement or a dryer to have as a backup, this would fit the bill. Otherwise I didn't find anything remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Fast and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Well it is good looking and works okay. It doesnt blow as hard or as hot as my Remington. I am using it and I believe the infrared is making my hair dry quicker than my Remington. It is light and quieter. I'm keeping it for now.
customer_reviews.author: CoachLozada

customer_reviews.title: it works.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a Revlon hairdryer I have had for more than 15 years.(It still works, but now I use it in my pottery studio and running it back and forth between my bathroom and my studio isn't reasonable. LOL!!! I like the new upgrades--- color, technology, etc, but the handle is a bit awkward. I like my old handle better. My old one also had more settings--- this one has "low" high" but no medium. I do like that it still has the "cool air" button. It works. It dries my hair and that is what I needed it for. insta hydeparkhill
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use and SO MUCH FRIZZ
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I do with this dryer, I can't get my hair smooth, even in dry winter weather when my hair is usually the most manageable. The shape of the handle and placement of the cold shot button are also very awkward-- in the only comfortable position for my hand, it's far too easy to accidentally hold down the cold button, and I have to contort my hand hold to avoid it. Overall, the dryer just feels like so much cheap plastic that doesn't get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: VoxyMommy

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this works. I was going to buy a more expensive dryer- I thought maybe spending $60-$70 would make a difference. But I’m glad I went for this first. I have coarse wavy hair that usually takes forever to dry and usually dries frizzy. With this dryer it was really fast and not frizzy at all. My hair looked smooth and silky. I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Caliegh

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use to think all hair dryers were the same, just had different advertising verbiage. But this dryer really does as advertised. My hair really does get dried twice as fast and with a smooth finish!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is HUGE. I like to keep my hair dryer in my bathroom, which is small, I had no where to put it. I kept my old dryer on a hanging hook and it was perfect. This dryer is like having a rocket ship in your bathroom. It was also somewhat cumbersome and awkward for me to use. It would need its own suitcase if you wanted to travel w/it. W/all that said, it is a nice hair dryer, it just didn't work for my needs. If you have a large bathroom or a large drawer to store it in it is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky Feeling Hair
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great, my hair is silky soft after I am done. I am only giving it 4 stars because it does take a bit longer to dry my hair than my usual dryer, but I love how my hair feels afterwards! I have not used the directional piece yet but it fits nice and snug. I have not had any issues with the buttons being on the handle part and I love the cold shot, it actually produces cold air! PS: I was not paid nor given anything in return for this review!!! I have spoken.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Price is right but device is bulky
customer_reviews.text: Definitely bulky, hard to change the attachments. My arm gets tired having to hold it up with the defuser attachment, which makes it awkward how much further out you have to hold it. I guess it beats the price of a deva hair dryer but at this point it might be worth the investment so I dont have to take so long at such awkward angles.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hair dryer, the settings are as is it doesn't get like scalding hot and you have to hold the cold button while you dry so you don't damage your hair. The settings are great on this. Very light weight dryer. Has my hair dry in under 7 to 8 minutes which is great considering its about mid back on me and typically takes my hair a very long time to get completely dry. And the colors are super cute. Creamy white color with like a rose gold pink.. I love it
customer_reviews.author: The Martin's

customer_reviews.title: attachments fall off easily
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this purchase it’s my first infrared dryer. The dryer works great, makes drying time shorter. However if you like me and need the attachments don’t get this dryer. The attachment fall off with the slightest touch or pressure; especially when hot. If I just gently put the dryer down on the bathroom counter the attachment flies off. We all know if your blow drying your hair with a round brush that attachment coming off is a killer to the process. I would not purchase this dryer again. Now in less than a few weeks I have to buy another hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: csalgado

customer_reviews.title: I purchased February 2
customer_reviews.text: I have never traveled with this blow dryer. I don't use it but maybe 3 times a week. It broke (the plug shorted out) and unable to use after 5 months?! No. Find one that has a warranty. Ridiculous. I've always used Revlon.
customer_reviews.author: Mora L Luke

customer_reviews.title: Definitely got a return
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping the item because my other hairdryer went and I need one however I am not particularly satisfied. The item was most definitely a repackaged return. Inside the Revlon box itself there was no insulation, just the dryer and the attachments thrown in. There is visible wear on the hairdryer itself. I am not sure if it was returned because of an issue. So far I only used it once quick. I am fine with receiving a returned item if it works 100% but Amazon should let the consumer know this and issue an open box discount.
customer_reviews.author: 617nico

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked this hair dryer if it would’ve lasted longer than 11 weeks. The high setting stopped working and only works on low now. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Burke

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the hassel of returning it and dont get it.
customer_reviews.text: Move on. While its pretty and the description says all the right things it doesnt carry much drying power. It took twice as long to blow dry my thick long hair. Im returning mine. It was a horrible choice. I read all the mixed reviews and thought id try it for myself. The dryer i had before was amazing and this one doesnt compare. It feels like a toy blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: tina brun

customer_reviews.title: Second one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! I thought about getting a high end dryer, but after trying them out, I decided that I didn't want to part with my handy dandy revlon. It dries my hair so quickly, and my hair doesn't get frizzy. My previous one lasted me 4-5 years, and I used it every 2 or 3 days. It even survived a move across the country ;) I have thicker hair- East Asian!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this to arrive. Love the Brand. Was surprised with all that it came with. Came with a diffuser, and 3 alligator clips to part my hair while drying it in sections. I dont know of any other manufacturer that includes those. Like the heat settings, and the cook down button as well. I hang mine up to sit, until the next use. Has a long cord, and works well and fast. I have long hair and this is better than my last dryer, and I had it for 6 yrs. I hope this one lasts as long. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Moved from West Coast to Mid West and couldn't bring all my things so bought this to replace the hairdryer I left behind. Def a good product. I used it on my hair and on the drywall mud during remodeling lol Works wonderfully! I'm not entirely sure how to properly use the curl/volume attachment but the rest of it is great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, results - not so sleek
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an amazing product. I, personally, love the cool shot button. Without any attachments, it dries super fast and with the concentrator, you get that semi-sleek look. I put bare minimum effort and these are the results. Hot button gets too hot, I use the “warm” button on “low” fan speed. For curly hair, there is a diffuser also.
customer_reviews.author: Kalmah666

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. Not a lot of frills, but can be switched from hot to warm, high or low, and has a cool shot button. Removable back to clean screen in a snap. I have straight hair so I haven't used the diffuser attachment, but the smoothing attachment I use every time I dry my hair and it leaves is soft and silky with no product added. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harvey

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up , here is why...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gorgeous compared to most boring blow-dryers. Has style and a light on the end when powered on for looks. Which makes it look more expensive. The buttons are a little different compared to cheaper ones so they put more expensive parts on it to me. Revlon period is great compared to competitors. Wish it had a tad more power but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drying and straightening power
customer_reviews.text: My third one of these hair dryers and won’t be my last! I’ve got frizzy, wavy nightmare hair and, paired with a ceramic round brush, get a perfect blowout every time, with little product and in half the time of other dryers. I’ve tried other, much more expensive hair dryers without the same great results. Admittedly, it’ll only last a couple of years of wear and tear, but at this price and with these results, I’m happy to buy a new one each time.
customer_reviews.author: One happy lady

customer_reviews.title: Poor switch layout
customer_reviews.text: The dryer provides quite warm air on "warm" and hot on "hot," but button layout is proving to be a problem. The cool air button is really small, making it hard to hold in, and this causes your hand to shut the dryer off with the heel of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: PublishingFauxPas

customer_reviews.title: Attachments got stuck and had to return
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer got excellent reviews and also highly recommended as an ecologically positive product (from another website). While it worked well, the first dryer I received had to be returned. One of the attachments got so stuck when I put it on, that neither I, my engineer spouse, or my hair dresser could get it off. Just before I returned the item, my spouse was able (with much force) to detach the attachment and determined the threads on the dryer itself likely were not properly produced, thereby creating this problem. Amazon sent a replacement, which works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: marym

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Dries Hair Super Fast, And Looks as Good As The Salon!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this dryer! I use the “concentrator” piece on the tip of the dryer and it makes your hair look smooth, taking out all the frizz! As you roll the brush in your hair, hold the clear plastic concentrator right up against the hair as you roll the brush to style smooth. I just LOVE how this made my hair so smooth!!! Get it! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: PattyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly but has some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice so far but it has decreased drying time by a few minutes and my hair looks pretty sleek. The attachments go on easily and don't seem to pop off unless I really bump them. The cool shot button, however, is way too easy to inadvertently press and I found I had to hold the dryer awkwardly to avoid it. So it's a pretty nice dryer for the price but I'd be upset if I had spent more than $30 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really works and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY surprised by this dryer! My hair is long (about 7 inches from my bum) and thick. This dryer actually dried my hair in 15 minutes!!!😳 I used the “smoothing concentrator attachment). It usually takes 30 minutes or so! It was wet and I sectioned it into 5 sections. My hair is naturally curly so I was straightening it as well with a round brush. It is a very light and my last dyer was heavy and a pain to blow dry. My hair was left shiny and well-conditioned(of course I used a pre-dry spray/heat protectant as well). I imagine the infrared feature is similar to the driers they sit you under in a hair salon??
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient dryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer, it does a good job. My go to setting is hot temp and low speed. The only thing I’m still trying to adjust to are the controls which are on the outside of the handle. That makes it a little cumbersome to deal with when changing speed or temperature. I haven’t travelled with it yet but it will be fine. It is a full size dryer but not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised by how great this hairdryer is for the price- I got mine to try to start wearing my hair curly and the diffuser works great!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Fast and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I also was a T3 Owner, I used this for the first time today and it worked great! It comes with the concentrater and diffuser and clips! It has a lot of power and left my hair dry faster than the T3. My hair is soft and not frizzy. Overall a great purchase for a cheap price!!! I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed by this dryer considering how fragile the attachments are. It dries like a normal 1875w dryer does but I had a halo of frizz after using it (I finished with the cool air and that didn’t solve it). It’s aesthetically nice, but I can see the clear attachments getting broken if you take it on a trip or drop it on the ground. I ended up returning it and getting a more powerful one.
customer_reviews.author: Karinna

customer_reviews.title: A really Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had a Hot Tool that quit on my after several years but I wasn't wanting to spend alot on a hair dryer. So I did some research and found out that this dryer is also made by the same company so for a third of the cost I thought I would give it a try. I am really liking it so far. The red lights makes it just a little extra but I am like the settings and the cool setting too.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for people, good for barbies.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times for my daughter, and it’s drying power is top notch. It also works great on drying stuffed animals and Barbie hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! Lightweight, powerful, and great diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this hair dryer, and diffuser combo! I have curly 3C hair, and this diffuser makes my curls pop in no time! It is superrrr lightweight so my arms don’t get tired either! It also cut my dry time considerably! Definitely a wonderful buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chronically Living Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I use this blow dryer constantly and it does the job well. I don’t straighten my hair but I do use both heat and cool air and I like it much better than my previous blow dryer. All I have to say is the cool button is in a little bit of an uncomfortable position but I would still recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Craps out!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer. The first one stopped working after a day. The second one stopped working 6 months after I bought it. Save your money and pay for something that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Desertdweller

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought and only because I dropped the first one on a tile floor and it broke. I mean it really bounced. Then it was making weird noises and not blowing hot. I loved it and lamented having to choose a new dryer. I was so happy I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: Does not dry any quicker than my old dryer, and it is slightly heavy and cumbersome. The red light has no purpose but it does alarm me every time I use the dryer. Not my favorite purchase . . .
customer_reviews.author: Tainttellin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck. Salon Style
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with this. I did my research on blow dryers and this one met all the requirements that a professional salon would use!
customer_reviews.author: Komasi

customer_reviews.title: It is a Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product drying my thick, coarse, Hair! Using this product, my Hair is very easy to manage, nice texture, beautiful Shine , very soft! I am very happy ,with my purchase I recommend ,this product to other’s!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this for the past month or so, and I have to say I'm impressed. It's very lightweight and not extremely loud. And I think it does dry my hair a LITTLE faster. All in all, a great dryer for the price. (And it's nice that it comes with a few clips as well).
customer_reviews.author: Cats Books and Wine (Things I Like)

customer_reviews.title: excellent light weight hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer after reading multiple reviews and recommendations for drying my hair type. I have fine, thin (and thinning) hair so adding volume and style without damage is really important. I've used this dryer for a couple of weeks now. It is very light-weight with well positioned control buttons on the outside of the handle. The cool button is conveniently located on the inside and is effective. I use the concentrator attachment to direct the air flow, it is easy to get on and off. With a retractable cord it would get a 5-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R Duncan

customer_reviews.title: It’s good. But there’s a technical issue...
customer_reviews.text: I like the dryer. It works well enough. The problem I have with it is this: I attached the diffuser for my curls and I used it a few times, when I went to detach it it was completely stuck. It took two people to get it off without breaking the entire thing. There’s little clips inside the dryer that clip the diffuser in and make it almost impossible to get out. So if you’re just going to keep the diffuser on it, great. But if you want to switch out the nozzles, i honestly wish I would’ve picked a different device.
customer_reviews.author: taylor carr

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived damaged with no styrofoam protection
customer_reviews.text: This box is damaged and seems like opened and repasted the seals. Hairdryer was there without any styrofoam or any kind of protection. Feels like it may have been a used one, is that why the coupon? anyway the it's working without any issue. Drying power is less even with that whopping 1875W, It's more than my AC unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kushan Jayathilake

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been using the same hairdryer for like a decade. It would take me 20-30 minutes to get my hair dry. With this dryer 5-10 minutes and I’m done!! The only thing I would like more is if it had a retractable cord like my old one, but I would still recommend this dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product as stated, light weight, power cord is a nice length. There is two setting for temperature. Excellent air flow ability. At check out, I received a coupon for $7.50 off the price. This is a great value, for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: EQ

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. While it is too big to travel with, it is perfect for home use, and I love the volume attachments! Priced similarly to other "just hairdryers", but has additional items to increase the buying power!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lum

customer_reviews.title: Works well, short handle
customer_reviews.text: The power of this dryer is great; my hair dries pretty quickly. The red lights are cool to look at, but don't do anything. My one complaint is that the handle is fairly short and not as easy to hold as some other dryers I've had. The buttons are on the front of the handle, so it's easy to accidentally switch it off. Otherwise, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase if your intention is to diffuse
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this blow drying for about a month and i will say that it is kind of aggravating go use, especially if your trying to diffuse because the attachment isn’t very sturdy & i always find myself hitting buttons unintentionally. The cool setting is in a very awkward place as well. I wouldn’t recommend this if you’re are wanting it for the diffusing or cool feature..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. It is my favorite of any hair dryer I’ve used. However, the plastic clear attachment on the end falls off while drying my hair. This is why it’s getting 4 instead of 5 stars for me. It’s frustrating to have to stop and reattach the end piece.
customer_reviews.author: MIRANDA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new hairdryer and took a chance on this one. Wow! It dries my hair in less than 5 minutes, and makes it quite shiny and sleek. I don't need to straighten my hair afterwards, the dryer does most of the work.
customer_reviews.author: LMichele

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of this model, but this is the first one that was defective. Unfortunately, it was right after the return window closed though. The heat just stopped working and my hair won't dry without heat. If I had purchased it in a store, I could have returned/exchanged it when that happened.
customer_reviews.author: PH419

customer_reviews.title: Cold Air/Slow Dry
customer_reviews.text: While in use, the hot air turns cold then back to hot quite frequently. Doesn’t dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser does NOT fit
customer_reviews.text: Diffuser doesn’t fit. The diffuser is a screw on and the hair dryer isn’t. I have no idea how are people making it fit on some of the pictures. I’ve tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice product. Although it doesn't perform as well as the Dyson, it is a good, cost-effective option, especially in these uncertain times. My hair dried quickly and had quite a lot of body -- without the frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Pianist

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Product came defective, worked for 5 mins and then would not power off unless unplugged. Once plugged back up it would automatically start without requiring the use of the power switch. I spent longer on the phone with amazon to replace the item than the amount of time the blow dryer worked
customer_reviews.author: Shammy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really fast drying and love that the attachment isn't falling off constantly.
customer_reviews.author: kellye

customer_reviews.title: It's a favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one of these, and I really like it. I exclusively style dry my hair, which is long and needs to be done in sections, and the performance for the price is good. I also use the curl diffuser when I go curly.
customer_reviews.author: TCP

customer_reviews.title: Worst diffuser set up!!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer itself is great but.... this is the worst diffuser set up ever!!! It falls off multiple times during drying process making the drying process a pain in the butt and time consuming! Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Not much output power , either warm or extra hot. Have noticed no change in hair health. Box arrived extremely damaged and open, with pieces missing and my only option was to do without a dryer and send it back and wait for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L

customer_reviews.title: Nozzles could not be attached!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the hairdryer arrived I took out the nozzles and tried to attach them, cause I was that excited. But after trying and trying to turn them and attach them onto the dryer I realized it was not working. Not only one but both nozzles are impossible to attach. I bought this product because of the attachable nozzles. I am so disappointed and will remain this way until I get a working replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hairdryer!!
customer_reviews.text: Like this hairdryer. It dries my hair super fast. It comes with 2 extra attachments and 3 hair clips. Its light weight and compact for easy travel. The best of all is the settings the hot, warm and cold shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Blow Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Really good blow dryer. Definitely dries my curly hair quick , I straighten my hair as well plus no frizz!! Yayy! The only thing they could of done differently is the on off switch is on the handle in your palm so I do end up turning it off in the middle of my blowdry , otherwise I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovechild

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product. Except!
customer_reviews.text: i love this hair dryer. It is the second one I have owned. The only issue with it is the control switches are right on the handle where you hold it, so on occasion I accidentally hit the switches and shut it off when trying to dry my hair. The switch on the handle of my first dryer stopped functioning so I hope this one doesn’t do the same thing. If I does I won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chip D.

customer_reviews.title: great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. the last dryer brand I had, the attachment fell off 100 times a dry. This one really secures the diffusers tight. It is a bit heavy but that is not an issue for me. Love it, Recommend this
customer_reviews.author: eileen06

customer_reviews.title: Received a faulty hair dryer. Randomly tips breaker
customer_reviews.text: Update: Randomly trips breaker every now and then. No other electronics are connected to my dressing room breaker circuit. My old hair dryer also has the same wattage, but this problem never happened before with my Conair.
customer_reviews.author: T N

customer_reviews.title: Guys, this makes a great present
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend had been squawking about needing a new dryer for a while so I bought her this one. She couldn't be happier with every aspect of it. She says the infrared dried so well she no longer needed an iron !!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Yessss
customer_reviews.text: Great hair dryer. I have thick hair and was tired of spending 30 minutes sweating and drying every inch of hair on my head. This has cut the drying time in half for me. Not to mention I can tell a difference in the texture of my hair as well (did not change any hair products). Silky smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Gilland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is wonderful. I use the diffuser and low heat for the Curly girl method and this dryer works wonderfully. Great product and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and absolutely love it !
customer_reviews.text: I have long thick curly hair, with this blow dryer it took me half the time to dry it!! It’s got a lot of power compared to others I have used. Hair actually came out straight and with the cold shot it was smooth and less frizzy !
customer_reviews.author: Beth L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a week now, dries my thick hair really well (10ish min with the diffuser after towel drying) and my frizzy wavy curls are more like curls. It's pretty light weight and it feels dinky and kinda cheap (which for $19 it is) but it does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Cuddly Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Product quality, punctuality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am fascinated by my dryer, the product is very good quality and super time I arrive at the location that I indicated as well as my other products that arrived on time, and all that collaborate to assist us as best as possible and make it very well my products Thanks Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Luis E.

product_meta.title: Revlon 1875W Infrared Hair Dryer for Faster Drying And Maximum Shine
product_meta.description: Revlon Hair Tools is dedicated to helping women achieve beautiful hair they'll love! Whether women desire gorgeous blowouts, big enviable waves, striking straight locks, or the perfect fashion accessory to complete the look, Revlon has the styling tools you desire. Our innovative Pro Collection line will provide you with the latest technology to help you achieve desired results fast! About the Product: The Revlon Salon Infrared Styler creates unforgettably beautiful blowouts! Designed with Infrared Heat Technology which taps into your hair's natural moisture, prevents over-drying and delivers maximum shine. This Revlon hair dryer combines three layers of Ceramic Coating to help reduce heat damage. Boosted with Tourmaline Ionic Technology, for perfect hair and smooth results. Plus, added Concentrator and Volumizing Finger Diffuser attachments give you maximum precision for truly customized hairstyles.
feature_bullets: Infrared Heat Technology for Maximum Shine, Softness and Control
Tourmaline Ionic Technology Reduces Frizz and Enhances Shine
2 Heat / 2 Speed Settings and Cool Shot Button for maximum control

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
